metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17546 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
tif_getimage.c in LibTIFF through 4.0.10, as used in GDAL through 3.0.1 andother products, has an integer overflow that potentially causes aheap-based buffer overflow via a crafted RGBA image, related to a"Negative-size-param" condition.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17546` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.3
libtiff-tools - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.3
libtiff5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.3
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

chromium-browser - 80.0.3987.87-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 80.0.3987.87-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 80.0.3987.87-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 80.0.3987.87-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 80.0.3987.87-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.9-5ubuntu0.3').
insighttoolkit4 package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
blender package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
texmaker package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
chromium-browser package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '80.0.3987.87-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
libtk-img package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
sfftobmp package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtimageformats-opensource-src package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
paraview package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
povray package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
neuron package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
ivtools package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
xloadimage package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
